description: ff. 237. 163 x 105; 120 x 53 mm. 17 lin. Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1145, Fayḍ Allāh ibn Ibrāhīm. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 549 (gloss I ); S I, 760 (m); Fihrist al-makhṭūṭāt (1961-63) II, 50; Arabische, türkische und persische Handschriften der Universitätsbibliothek in Bratislava, 114; Gazi Husrev-Begova Biblioteka u Sarajevu, 651 (with title Kanz al-farāʼid). Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى توحد بالعظمة First gloss (fol. 2a): ... بسم الله الرحمن الرحىم مستعىنا به او متبرکا ومتىمنا
author: Ḥanafī, Ramaḍān ibn Muḥammad
creator: Ḥanafī, Ramaḍān ibn Muḥammad
subject: Taftāzānī, Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar, 1322-1389?—Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah
